name: part_004
file: tmp_Airani iofifteen Birthday 2025 3D Live, Have a Nice Trip and Dream #iofiLucidDream [mMDPWutdkDM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora and Airani Iofifteen perform 'THERE IS A REASON'.
Instrumental outro and scene transition to a campfire in space.
MC section where Sora and Iofi sit around a campfire and talk.

subtitles.original: Together...
subtitles.english: Together...

subtitles.original: Together...
subtitles.english: Together...

subtitles.original: 愛のために進むのは
subtitles.english: The reason I move forward for the sake of love

subtitles.original: 君とここにいるから
subtitles.english: Is because I am here with you

subtitles.original: 僕だけが
subtitles.english: Because I am the only one

subtitles.original: 君を守るから
subtitles.english: Who will protect you

subtitles.original: 愛のために願うのは
subtitles.english: What I wish for the sake of love

subtitles.original: そして共に生き抜くこと
subtitles.english: Is to survive together

subtitles.original: ずっと together
subtitles.english: Always together

subtitles.original: Believe...
subtitles.english: Believe...

subtitles.original: Together...
subtitles.english: Together...

subtitles.original: Together...
subtitles.english: Together...

subtitles.original: イオフィ、お誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Yoppi, happy birthday!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: やっと！今年も来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: We did it! Thanks for coming again this year!

subtitles.original:
え～どうもこんにちは、ときのそらです。
よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english:
Hello, everyone, I'm Tokino Sora.
Nice to meet you!

subtitles.original: こちら。へへへ。
subtitles.english: And I'm over here. Hehehe.

subtitles.original: や～なんかね、バラード歌っちゃったね。
subtitles.english: We really sang a ballad, didn't we?

subtitles.original: ね～
subtitles.english: We did!

subtitles.original: より私すごい気になってるんだけど、なんなんこの…（笑）
subtitles.english:
But more than that, I'm really curious about...
what even is this? (Laughs)

subtitles.original: こたつ…？
subtitles.english: A kotatsu...?

subtitles.original: いいえ、宇宙寒いからこれ温かいよ。
subtitles.english: No, since space is cold, this keeps us warm.

subtitles.original: え～宇宙で焚き火なんてできるんだね。
subtitles.english: Wow, you can actually have a campfire in space.

subtitles.original: できるよ一応。
subtitles.english: Well, technically you can.

subtitles.original: だって酸素があるってことだ！
subtitles.english: That means there's oxygen!

subtitles.original:
あ、でもでも、酸素いるからさ、
今のこれバリアいるから。
subtitles.english:
Ah, but since we need oxygen,
there's a barrier here right now.

subtitles.original: バリアおるからね。
subtitles.english: Because there's a barrier, you see.

subtitles.original: 酸素ないから、ないんだったらもう耐えないじゃん。
subtitles.english:
Since there's no oxygen,
we wouldn't last if we didn't have it.

subtitles.original: あ～そうだね。そうだね。
subtitles.english: Ah, that's true. That's true.

subtitles.original: うん、そう。温かいよ、これ。
subtitles.english: Right. This is warm.

subtitles.original: イオフィさ、なんか…
subtitles.english: You know, Yoppi...

subtitles.original: 何何？
subtitles.english: Yes?

subtitles.original: MCでこんなにまったり焚き火の前で、こう…
subtitles.english:
Having an MC segment where we're
relaxing in front of a campfire...

subtitles.original: なんか夜のなんか二人で喋っちゃうみたいな雰囲気で…
subtitles.english: ...it feels like we're just two people chatting at night.

subtitles.original: やることないよ。ないから、ちょっと変な感じがする。
subtitles.english: We don't usually do this. It feels a bit strange.

subtitles.original: あ～そうだね、普通にさ、ポーズしたあとにこう…
subtitles.english: Ah, that's true. Usually, after doing a pose...

subtitles.original: 「あ！ありがとう！歌ったね！」って言うじゃん。
subtitles.english: ...we'd be like, "Ah! Thank you! We sang that!" right?

subtitles.original: ね！すぐそうだよね。
subtitles.english: Right! That's how it usually goes.

subtitles.original: すぐだけど、やっぱり今年のテーマもっと緩いとかも…
subtitles.english: It's immediate, but this year's theme is more "mellow"...

subtitles.original: 落ち着く雰囲気欲しいから、
subtitles.english: ...and I wanted a more relaxed atmosphere...

subtitles.original: そのダンスとあの歌のあとにちょ…
subtitles.english: ...so after the dance and that song...

subtitles.original: マイクをね、ちょっと落としてここに座ってるっていう。ね。
subtitles.english: ...we just set down the mics and sat here. You know?

subtitles.original: でもいいね。
subtitles.english: But it's nice.

subtitles.original:
なんかまったりできるから、ちょっとのんびりして
お喋りできる感じ、いいと思う。すごく。
subtitles.english:
Since we can relax and chat at our own pace.
I think it's really good.

subtitles.original: やったやった！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: でね、今年誕生日にあの二回ぐらい歌んだよね。
subtitles.english:
And you know, I've had you sing for
my birthday twice already.

subtitles.original: 毎年。そう。
subtitles.english: Every year, really.

subtitles.original: 今年…ん？去年も？
subtitles.english: This year... wait, last year too?

subtitles.original: あ、去年とおととしとってこと？
subtitles.english: Ah, you mean last year and the year before?

subtitles.original: そうそうそう。
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, yes.

subtitles.original: 今年で、来年も来る？
subtitles.english: So this year too. Will you come next year?

subtitles.original: え、もちろんもちろんよ！呼んでもらえればいつでも行くよ！
subtitles.english:
Oh, of course, of course!
If you invite me, I'll come anytime!

subtitles.original: お！やった！じゃ決定で。（笑）
subtitles.english: Oh! Yay! Then it's decided! (Laughs)

subtitles.original: やった～！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original:
そしたらなんかもうこの去年と今年も結構
ハンドマイクであのやってるから…
subtitles.english:
Since both last year and this year we've been
using hand mics...

subtitles.original: そうだね、結構…
subtitles.english: True, we have.

subtitles.original: そうそう。聴かせるみたいな感じの曲ばかりだったじゃない？
subtitles.english:
They've both been the kind of songs
meant for listening, right?

subtitles.original: じゃ来年はバリバリ踊ります？そしたら。
subtitles.english: So, shall we dance our hearts out next year?

subtitles.original: 踊る～！
subtitles.english: Let's dance!

subtitles.original: うおお～！
subtitles.english: Woah!

subtitles.original: いいね。踊りやっぱりね、大好き。踊り。
subtitles.english: Sounds good. I really love dancing, after all.

subtitles.original: 大好き！
subtitles.english: I love it too!

subtitles.original: イオフィは？
subtitles.english: How about you, Yoppi?

subtitles.original: 好き好き好き！
subtitles.english: I love it, love it, love it!

subtitles.original: ね、いいよね。
subtitles.english: Right, it's great.

subtitles.original:
や、でもさなんか今年のさテーマさっきも聞いて
バラードだって聞いて…
subtitles.english:
But you know, when I heard this year's theme
was ballads...

subtitles.original:
やっぱさバラードのさ、全体をさ、ライブするのって
すごい難しいなって私は思っちゃうの。
subtitles.english:
I really feel like doing a whole live show with only
ballads is actually quite difficult.

subtitles.original: ほ？
subtitles.english: Oh?

subtitles.original: やっぱ演出とかもそうだけどさ、
subtitles.english: The staging and everything else aside...

subtitles.original: やっぱ私はいつもダンスとかで見せるみたいなのやるから、
subtitles.english: ...since I usually focus on "showing" through dance...

subtitles.original: バラードで挑戦するのってすごいなって思っててさ。
subtitles.english:
...I think it's amazing to take on the challenge
of a ballad.

subtitles.original:
あ～、そう、でもなんか自分にとってはあのバラードが
あの一番声に似合うから。
subtitles.english: Ah... well, for me, I feel ballads suit my voice the best.

subtitles.original: あ、ね。
subtitles.english: Ah, I see.

subtitles.original: そう、なんかもっと見せたいな～とは思ってて。
subtitles.english: So I've been wanting to show that more.

subtitles.original: そ、だからね。
subtitles.english: Yeah, so...

subtitles.original: お、ほら見える！いっぱい！
subtitles.english: Oh, look! There's so many!

subtitles.original: うわ～！綺麗～宇宙！
subtitles.english: Wow! Space is so beautiful!

subtitles.original:
宇宙に来ました。あの去年もちょっとい…
一応は宇宙にいたんだけど、
subtitles.english:
We've arrived in space. Last year we were also
technically in space...

subtitles.original: あんまり見えないかもしれないですね。
subtitles.english: ...but you might not have been able to see it as well.

subtitles.original: だから今年はちゃんと宇宙に行きたいですって。
subtitles.english:
So this year, I really wanted us to go to
space properly.

subtitles.original: わ～すごい！宇宙来ました、二人で。
subtitles.english: Wow, amazing! The two of us have come to space.

subtitles.original: すごい！
subtitles.english: It's amazing!

subtitles.original: あ、綺麗本当に。
subtitles.english: Ah, it's really beautiful.

subtitles.original: お、なんか姉さんと似合うじゃん？
subtitles.english: Hey, doesn't it suit you, Sora-neesan?

subtitles.original: 本当？
subtitles.english: Really?

subtitles.original: そう、なんか普通にイメージカラーが青だから。
subtitles.english: Yeah, since your image color is blue.

subtitles.original: ね。
subtitles.english: Right.

subtitles.original: ほら、合うの、ステージもこっちも。うん。
subtitles.english: See, it matches both the stage and the surroundings.

subtitles.original: え、いいな。可愛いな～。へへへ。
subtitles.english: Hehe, that's nice. It's so cute. Hehehe.
